content: designed for stitch up chicago 2024 featuring berroco renew fiber is a fully sustainable fiber made from recycled materials it is light and works up wonderfully materials berroco renew 164 yds / 150 m 1 75 oz / 50 g color 1307 koala approximate yardage 138 207 276 yds 42 g 63 g 84 g 7 4 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle tape measure abbreviations fdc foundation double_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet single_crochet- single_crochet skip- skip slip_stitch- slip_stitch gauge 17 sts x 11 row in pattern row 2-5 = 4 sizes 13 19 26 w x 7 h inspiration notes the cowl is work in the round with simple stitches that only look complex and create wonderful drape it comes in three sizes a close single wrap mid-length single wrap and a double wrap
